features: OUR HAIR CARE PROMISE. Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower Hair Volume and Bounty Shampoo gently cleanses with a lightweight formula, providing body and hair volume for fine hair
REUSABLE BOTTLE and REFILLS. Our refills are designed to be used with our reusable shampoo bottle. The more you reuse, the more you reduce your plastic use and environmental impact
VEGAN SHAMPOO WITH INGREDIENTS INSPIRED BY NATURE. Infused with Organic Coconut Water, this volumizing shampoo for fine hair is bursting with the scent of delicate Mimosa Flowers
YES Safe for Colored Hair, YES Vegan Shampoo, YES Sulfate Free Shampoo YES with Plant Based Detanglers, YES Natural Coconut Oil for hair, YES Shampoo for Thinning Hair

HAIR VOLUMIZING SHAMPOO FORMULA WITH 6 FREE FROMS. Paraben-free, Silicone-free, Dye-free, Cruelty-free, Phthalate-free, Sulfate-free. 92 percent NATURALLY DERIVED and safe enough to use on all hair types
body.description: At Love Beauty and Planet we are committed to acts of love that make you and our planet a little more beautiful, every day. Our goal is a carbon footprint so small it's like we weren't even here. We started our journey by loading our beauty products with goodness, and now we're creating innovative packaging solutions like reusable bottles and refills. Over the course of a year, the more you refill, the more you reduce your plastic use and your impact on the environment. Build bounce into your hair with our Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower Sulfate Free Shampoo for hair volume. Our volumizing shampoo for fine hair is made with plant-based cleansers and infused with organic coconut oil. Show off lush, bountiful tresses with an energizing burst of delicate Mimosa Flower, sourced ethically from the Region of Khemisset in Morocco. To get started, check out our line of beautifully designed aluminum reusable bottles. Use this refill pack to empty into bottle when running low. For brilliantly beautiful hair, try our range of volumizing hair products. After shampooing, follow up with our Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower Volume and Bounty Conditioner. In between washes, refresh your hair with our Volume and Bounty Dry Shampoo. Don’t stop with beautiful hair. Recharge with a jolt of energizing freshness delivered by our other hair care products, like our Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Water and Mimosa Flower Radical Refresher Body Wash. We are starting a beautiful movement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Love Beauty and Planet Volume and Bounty Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower Shampoo is cruelty-free, paraben-free, silicone-free, sulfate-free, dye-free, and formulated without phthalates. Designed to lightly moisturize fine hair, this shampoo leaves your hair feeling strong and volumized. 2021

Cruelty-Free and Vegan Shampoo Loving the planet means caring for all creatures who share it, so we are independently certified cruelty-free and vegan by PETA. 2021 Natural Coconut Oil for Hair Lock in moisture and let your strands flow strong and free with our coconut oil-infused collection for lush, bountiful tresses. Build Bounce Into Your Hair Our sulfate-free shampoo works to rejuvenate fine hair, coupled with an energizing burst of fragrant Mimosa Flower. Ethically Sourced Mimosa Flower We partner with Givaudan to ethically source and extract the powerful Mimosa Flower absolute from handpicked flower petals grown in Morocco.

Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower Conditioner in Reusable Bottle Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower Conditioner Refill Coconut Water & Mimosa Flower 2 in 1 Shampoo & Conditioner Bar Main Benefit Our sulfate-free shampoo works to rejuvenate fine hair, coupled with an energizing burst of fragrant Mimosa Flower. Our silicone-free conditioner works to rejuvenate fine hair, coupled with an energizing burst of fragrant Mimosa Flower. Our 2 in 1 shampoo & conditioner bar is a bottle-less solution that rejuvenates fine hair and provides volume.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair soft and shiny
reviews.reviewText: I have a problem with so many different shampoos leaving my hair dry and my scalp itchy causing a form of eczema on my scalp. I have used other natural shampoos that still seems to leave my hair dry and limp or with a "film" on my hair. I used this and I had no itchy scalp and my hair was left soft and shiny as well has a nice "soft" fragrance that isn't overpowering. Granted I have only used this once as I just received it, yet that's all I need to know this stuff works great for me because it only takes once for me to have a flare up on my scalp. The only issue I have is the pump does not work, yet since the shampoo works great in my hair I can live with unscrewing the cap to get the shampoo out everytime I wash my hair. I will definitely be buying this shampoo again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, perfect for hair. Rebuy, yes definitely and I do rebuy. Quality and price perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on hair
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo. Had been looking for something sulfate free. Tried some others, but this formula for fine hair gives body and volume. And it smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this shampoo I don’t even need to use conditioner and I have long hair. I am very impressed with this little known product. I have just begun getting those gray and white hair strands and this shampoo softens those course hairs and the smell of the product is a clean and refreshing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this product
reviews.reviewText: this shampoo and conditioner leaves my hair soft and manageable.I am allergic to sulfa and my scalp breaks out in hives.This shampoo does not do this . my hair also tends to be dry and this shampoo does not dry my hair out at all .highly recommend this product line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Found this in a store in Boston in the travel section. My hair loves it, no extra stuff in it. Was able to track it down on Amazon when I needed more !
